name: Blind & Low Vision Skills Training
description: The LightHouse has an Eye Center at their San Francisco location that offers the following eye care services: Low vision examinations each week, Contact lenses ordering, and Copy your prescription at the completion of your exam to be filled at your local optical retailer.
fullDescription: The LightHouse has an Eye Center at their San Francisco location that offers the following eye care services: Low vision examinations each week, Contact lenses ordering, and Copy your prescription at the completion of your exam to be filled at your local optical retailer.
whatTheyOffer: The LightHouse has an Eye Center at their San Francisco location that offers the following eye care services: Low vision examinations each week, Contact lenses ordering, and Copy your prescription at the completion of your exam to be filled at your local optical retailer.
howToGetIt: For more information or to schedule an exam, contact the UC Berkeley Optometry School at 510-642-5726.
cost: Accepted providers include Blue Shield of California, Vision Service Plan, Eyemed, March Vision, Medi-Cal, Medicare
agency: LightHouse For The Blind And Visually Impaired
